questions.title: Select All Patients
questions.description: Write a query to retrieve all columns and all rows from the **patients** table.
questions.hint: Use SELECT * to get all columns
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT * FROM patients

questions.title: Patient Names Only
questions.description: Write a query to retrieve only the **first_name** and **last_name** of all patients.
questions.hint: List the column names separated by commas after SELECT
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT first_name, last_name FROM patients

questions.title: All Students Info
questions.description: Write a query to get all information about all **students**.
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT * FROM students

questions.title: Employee Contact Details
questions.description: Write a query to get **first_name**, **email**, and **phone** of all employees.
questions.hint: Select specific columns separated by commas
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT first_name, email, phone FROM employees

questions.title: Course List
questions.description: Show the **course_code** and **name** of all courses.
questions.hint: SELECT the required columns from courses table
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT course_code, name FROM courses

questions.title: Male Patients
questions.description: Write a query to find all **male** patients (gender = 'M').
questions.hint: Use WHERE clause to filter rows
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'M'

questions.title: High Salary Employees
questions.description: Find all employees who earn more than **₹100,000**.
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT * FROM employees WHERE salary > 100000

questions.title: Toppers
questions.description: Find all students with **CGPA greater than 9.0**.
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT * FROM students WHERE cgpa > 9.0

questions.title: Active Projects
questions.description: Show all projects that have status **'active'**.
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT * FROM projects WHERE status = 'active'

questions.title: Patients by City
questions.description: Find all patients from **Mumbai**.
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT * FROM patients WHERE city = 'Mumbai'

questions.title: Sort Doctors by Salary
questions.description: List all doctors ordered by their **salary** from highest to lowest.
questions.hint: Use ORDER BY with DESC for descending order
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT * FROM doctors ORDER BY salary DESC

questions.title: Students by CGPA
questions.description: Show all students ordered by **CGPA** (highest first), then by **first_name** alphabetically.
questions.hint: ORDER BY can take multiple columns
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY cgpa DESC, first_name

questions.title: Recent Hires
questions.description: List all employees ordered by **hire_date** from newest to oldest.
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC

questions.title: Count All Patients
questions.description: Write a query to count the total number of patients.
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM patients

questions.title: Count Employees
questions.description: Count the total number of employees in the company.
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM employees

questions.title: Average Doctor Salary
questions.description: Find the **average salary** of all doctors.
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT AVG(salary) FROM doctors

questions.title: Total Project Budget
questions.description: Calculate the **total budget** of all projects.
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT SUM(budget) FROM projects

questions.title: Highest CGPA
questions.description: Find the **highest CGPA** among all students.
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT MAX(cgpa) FROM students

questions.title: Lowest Employee Salary
questions.description: Find the **minimum salary** in the company.
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT MIN(salary) FROM employees

questions.title: Unique Cities
questions.description: List all **unique cities** where patients live.
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT DISTINCT city FROM patients

questions.title: Unique States
questions.description: Show all **unique states** where students are from.
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT DISTINCT state FROM students

questions.title: Patients per City
questions.description: Count the number of patients in **each city**. Show city and count.
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT city, COUNT(*) FROM patients GROUP BY city

questions.title: Employees per Department
questions.description: Count employees in **each department**. Show department_id and count.
questions.hint: Use GROUP BY department_id with COUNT()
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT department_id, COUNT(*) FROM employees GROUP BY department_id

questions.title: Average CGPA by Department
questions.description: Find the **average CGPA** for each department.
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT department_id, AVG(cgpa) FROM students GROUP BY department_id

questions.title: Department Salary Totals
questions.description: Calculate the **total salary** expense for each department.
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT department_id, SUM(salary) FROM employees GROUP BY department_id

questions.title: Busy Departments
questions.description: Find departments with **more than 3 employees**. Show department_id and count.
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT department_id, COUNT(*) FROM employees GROUP BY department_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3

questions.title: Popular Cities
questions.description: Find cities with **2 or more patients**.
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT city, COUNT(*) FROM patients GROUP BY city HAVING COUNT(*) >= 2

questions.title: High-Paying Departments
questions.description: Find departments where **average salary is above ₹100,000**.
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT department_id, AVG(salary) FROM employees GROUP BY department_id HAVING AVG(salary) > 100000

questions.title: Doctor Details with Department
questions.description: Show each doctor's **first_name**, **last_name**, and their **department name**.
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT d.first_name, d.last_name, dept.name FROM doctors d JOIN departments dept ON d.department_id = dept.department_id

questions.title: Student with Department Name
questions.description: Show student **first_name**, **last_name**, and their **department name**.
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT s.first_name, s.last_name, d.name FROM students s JOIN departments d ON s.department_id = d.department_id

questions.title: Employee Department Info
questions.description: List employee **first_name**, **job_title**, and **department name**.
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT e.first_name, e.job_title, d.name FROM employees e JOIN departments d ON e.department_id = d.department_id

questions.title: Patient Admission Details
questions.description: Show patient **first_name**, **last_name**, **admission_date**, and **diagnosis** for all admissions.
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT p.first_name, p.last_name, a.admission_date, a.diagnosis FROM patients p JOIN admissions a ON p.patient_id = a.patient_id

questions.title: Courses with Professor Names
questions.description: Show **course name** and the **professor's full name** (first_name + last_name) teaching it.
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT c.name, p.first_name, p.last_name FROM courses c JOIN professors p ON c.professor_id = p.professor_id

questions.title: Project Team Members
questions.description: Show **project name**, **employee first_name**, and their **role** for all assignments.
questions.hint: JOIN projects with assignments, then with employees
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT p.name, e.first_name, a.role FROM projects p JOIN assignments a ON p.project_id = a.project_id JOIN employees e ON a.employee_id = e.employee_id

questions.title: Patient with Doctor Info
questions.description: For each admission, show **patient name**, **doctor name**, and **diagnosis**.
questions.hint: JOIN admissions with both patients and doctors
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT p.first_name AS patient_first, p.last_name AS patient_last, d.first_name AS doctor_first, d.last_name AS doctor_last, a.diagnosis FROM admissions a JOIN patients p ON a.patient_id = p.patient_id JOIN doctors d ON a.doctor_id = d.doctor_id

questions.title: Students with Course Grades
questions.description: Show student **first_name**, **course name**, and **grade** for all enrollments.
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT s.first_name, c.name, e.grade FROM students s JOIN enrollments e ON s.student_id = e.student_id JOIN courses c ON e.course_id = c.course_id

questions.title: Patients with Allergies
questions.description: Find all patients who have **allergies** (allergies is NOT NULL).
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT * FROM patients WHERE allergies IS NOT NULL

questions.title: Patients without Allergies
questions.description: Find all patients who do **not have allergies** (allergies is NULL).
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT * FROM patients WHERE allergies IS NULL

questions.title: Current Admissions
questions.description: Find all admissions where patient **has not been discharged yet** (discharge_date is NULL).
questions.hint: Patients still in hospital have NULL discharge_date
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT * FROM admissions WHERE discharge_date IS NULL

questions.title: Name Starting with A
questions.description: Find all patients whose **first_name starts with 'A'**.
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT * FROM patients WHERE first_name LIKE 'A%'

questions.title: Name Ending with 'a'
questions.description: Find all students whose **first_name ends with 'a'**.
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT * FROM students WHERE first_name LIKE '%a'

questions.title: Email Contains 'sharma'
questions.description: Find all employees whose **email contains 'sharma'**.
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT * FROM employees WHERE email LIKE '%sharma%'

questions.title: Five Letter Names
questions.description: Find all patients whose **first_name is exactly 5 characters** long.
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT * FROM patients WHERE first_name LIKE '_____'

questions.title: Maharashtra or Gujarat
questions.description: Find all patients from **Maharashtra or Gujarat**.
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT * FROM patients WHERE state IN ('Maharashtra', 'Gujarat')

questions.title: CS or EC Department
questions.description: Find all students in department_id **1 or 2** (Computer Science or Electronics).
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT * FROM students WHERE department_id IN (1, 2)

questions.title: Multiple Conditions
questions.description: Find employees in **Engineering** (department_id = 1) who earn more than **₹100,000**.
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department_id = 1 AND salary > 100000

questions.title: Senior or High Paid
questions.description: Find employees who are either **hired before 2018** OR earn more than **₹150,000**.
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT * FROM employees WHERE hire_date < '2018-01-01' OR salary > 150000

questions.title: Salary Range
questions.description: Find employees whose salary is **between ₹80,000 and ₹120,000** (inclusive).
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT * FROM employees WHERE salary BETWEEN 80000 AND 120000

questions.title: Conditional Difficulty
questions.description: Show student **first_name** and a **performance** column: 'Excellent' if CGPA >= 9, 'Good' if >= 7, else 'Average'.
questions.hint: Use CASE WHEN ... THEN ... ELSE ... END
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT first_name, CASE WHEN cgpa >= 9 THEN 'Excellent' WHEN cgpa >= 7 THEN 'Good' ELSE 'Average' END AS performance FROM students

questions.title: Salary Category
questions.description: Show employee **first_name** and **salary_band**: 'High' if salary > 120000, 'Medium' if > 80000, else 'Low'.
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT first_name, CASE WHEN salary > 120000 THEN 'High' WHEN salary > 80000 THEN 'Medium' ELSE 'Low' END AS salary_band FROM employees

questions.title: Count by Gender
questions.description: Count the number of patients by **gender**.
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT gender, COUNT(*) FROM patients GROUP BY gender

questions.title: Department Budget Summary
questions.description: For each department, show **total salary** and **average salary**.
questions.hint: Use both SUM() and AVG() with GROUP BY
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT department_id, SUM(salary), AVG(salary) FROM employees GROUP BY department_id

questions.title: Speciality Count
questions.description: Count doctors by their **speciality**.
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT speciality, COUNT(*) FROM doctors GROUP BY speciality

questions.title: Projects by Department
questions.description: Show each **department name** and the **number of projects** assigned to it.
questions.hint: JOIN departments with projects, then GROUP BY
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT d.name, COUNT(p.project_id) FROM departments d JOIN projects p ON d.department_id = p.department_id GROUP BY d.name

questions.title: Admission Stats per Doctor
questions.description: Show each doctor's **name** and **number of admissions** they handled.
questions.hint: JOIN doctors with admissions, GROUP BY doctor
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT d.first_name, d.last_name, COUNT(a.admission_id) FROM doctors d JOIN admissions a ON d.doctor_id = a.doctor_id GROUP BY d.doctor_id, d.first_name, d.last_name

questions.title: Course Enrollment Count
questions.description: For each course, show **course name** and **number of students enrolled**.
questions.hint: JOIN courses with enrollments, GROUP BY course
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT c.name, COUNT(e.student_id) FROM courses c JOIN enrollments e ON c.course_id = e.course_id GROUP BY c.course_id, c.name

questions.title: Top 5 Paid Employees
questions.description: Show the **top 5 highest paid** employees (first_name, salary).
questions.hint: Use ORDER BY DESC with LIMIT 5
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT first_name, salary FROM employees ORDER BY salary DESC LIMIT 5

questions.title: Oldest Patients
questions.description: Find the **3 oldest patients** (earliest birth_date).
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY birth_date LIMIT 3

questions.title: Unique First Names
questions.description: Show first names that appear **only once** in the patients table.
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT first_name FROM patients GROUP BY first_name HAVING COUNT(*) = 1

questions.title: Department with Most Employees
questions.description: Find the **department_id** with the most employees.
questions.hint: GROUP BY, ORDER BY COUNT DESC, LIMIT 1
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT department_id FROM employees GROUP BY department_id ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1

questions.title: Students Without Enrollments
questions.description: Find students who have **no enrollments** (not enrolled in any course).
questions.hint: Use LEFT JOIN and check for NULL
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT s.* FROM students s LEFT JOIN enrollments e ON s.student_id = e.student_id WHERE e.enrollment_id IS NULL

questions.title: High Budget Active Projects
questions.description: Find **active** projects with budget **above ₹4,000,000**.
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT * FROM projects WHERE status = 'active' AND budget > 4000000

questions.title: Average Marks by Grade
questions.description: Find the **average marks** for each **grade** category.
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT grade, AVG(marks) FROM enrollments GROUP BY grade

questions.title: Employee Manager Names
questions.description: Show each employee's **name** and their **manager's name** (Self JOIN).
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT e.first_name AS employee, m.first_name AS manager FROM employees e LEFT JOIN employees m ON e.manager_id = m.employee_id

questions.title: Patients Per State Summary
questions.description: Count patients by **state**, ordered by count (highest first).
questions.hint: GROUP BY state, ORDER BY COUNT DESC
questions.expectedQuery: SELECT state, COUNT(*) as patient_count FROM patients GROUP BY state ORDER BY patient_count DESC
